direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing and comparing attribute data, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods handle attribute data validation and transformation, albeit in different contexts (encoding vs. decoding).
Both methods involve validating and setting the family attribute, making test cases for one method applicable to the other.
Both methods depend on the attribute type for their operations, making them relevant for testing interdependencies.
Both methods rely on the data length for validation and processing, making them relevant for testing data integrity.
